titleStmt.title: The witty vvesterne lasse: or, You maids, that with your friends whole nights have spent, beware back-fallings, for feare of the event. To a new tune, called The begger boy.
titleStmt.author: Guy, Robert, writer of ballads.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Sweet Lucina lend my thy aid ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
